description:
This course is designed to help anyone who is new to advertising online, or anyone that may be experiencing some challenges when it comes to marketing their products or services online.

You're going to learn how to quickly and inexpensively build one of the most valuable assets and online marketer can have- a targeted, responsive email list.

  • Here's just some of what you'll be learning in this course:
  • How to get a list of targeted email subscribers
  • Building an attractive, professional looking squeeze page
  • How to successfully run pay per click ad campaigns
  • Setting up an autoresponder
  • How to improve your Return On Investment

The skills you will learn from this course will enable you to be able to sell ANYTHING online.

One of the most phenomenal things about pay per click advertising is its ability to generate visitors to your content almost instantaneously. At the flip of a switch, you can virtually have thousands, if not millions of eyeballs, from around the world, looking at the product or service you're advertising, with the ability to measure just how profitable your advertising is doing. Few other advertising mediums have this capability.

This course is going to teach you the fundamentals behind how to set up a pay per click campaign that will allow you to collect the email addresses of individuals interested in the product or service you are offering. You will also get to see over my shoulder, step-by-step, how to build a professional looking landing page, and autoresponder.

You're also going to be taught how to bring down your advertising cost as well as increase your return on investment. We're also going to show you where to get some extremely valuable tools and resources COMPLETELY FOR FREE.

**BONUSES

1. For anyone investing in this course, you will need to have your own website and a web hosting account, if for some reason you do not have one, we will provide you with a link so that you will be able to sign up and get your FIRST 12 months of web hosting for only $1 PER MONTH as well as a FREE DOMAIN NAME.

2. You will ALSO get FREE access to our very popular video training course "The Backwards Sales Funnel". This course will teach you how to create all of the products in your sales funnel the right way, to help ensure that you have the highest converting sales funnel possible, quickly and easily starting from day one!

So let's not waste anymore valuable time, simply CLICK the "TAKE THIS COURSE" button now so that we can get things started!
title: Learn how to use pay per click ads for easy list building
